basics.name: Fabrizio Dante Pauselli
basics.label: Software Architect
basics.summary: Architect and Software Developer with 9 years of experience in the field. I have worked in different types of projects, from web applications to mobile applications, always looking for the best solution for the client. I have experience in leading teams and teaching.

work.name: Remitee
highlights: Driven the migration of the company's core services to the latest versions of the technologies used, increasing the performance of the applications.
Implemented CI/CD in the company's services to improve the deployment process.
work.summary:
Research and development in new technologies to improve digital products.

Responsibilities: Introduce and manage R&D initiatives, research and updating of technologies, software development.

work.name: Coderhouse
highlights: Teaching the "Backend Programming in Javascript" course
work.summary: Teach classes in different courses on web development.

work.name: EducacionIT
work.summary: Teach classes in different courses on web development.

highlights: Developed several Web API from scratch for clients
Migration from .Net Frameworks 4 to .Net Core 5 of an MVC webapp
Web Scraping of government pages collecting data for a doctoral thesis
work.summary: Frontend and Backend development, Webscapping of web pages.

work.name: SoulIT
highlights: Lead the development team in migrating a client's core application from PHP to Node.js using the NestJS framework and ReactJs.
Lead the maintenance and development of a client's application using .Net 6 and ReactJs.
work.summary:
Definition and implementation of procedures, methodologies, technologies and tools in development projects. Technical manager of developer teams.

Responsibilities: Introduce and manage R&D initiatives, research and updating of technologies, software development. Leadership and support to developers.

work.name: SoulIT
highlights: Developed a client's application using .Net Core and React-Native.
Migrated a client's application from .Net Framework to .Net Core.
work.summary: Backend and frontend development of custom (web and mobile) applications for external clients.

work.name: ANSES
highlights: Developed new modules for the organization's internal HR application.
work.summary: Development of internal web applications to the organization. Team of 4 people.

work.name: Ministerio de Producción y Trabajo de la Nación
work.summary: Development of web and desktop applications. Team of 10 -15 people.

work.summary: Testing of web and desktop applications in the Product Quality area.
work.location: Ciudad Autónoma de Buenos Aires, Argentina

volunteer.summary: Mentor in the Emplear + Empujar program, which seeks to help young people in vulnerable situations to enter the IT market.
